## About

#### Data Analysis

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(here)
```

```{r}
trees <- st_read(here("./data/geo_export_145e1dbe-8d16-4451-aa07-a8915754603a.shp"))
```

```{r}
# Group street tree frequency by zip code
zip_trees <- trees %>% 
  group_by(zipcode) %>% 
  summarise(tree_frequency = n())


ggplot(zip_trees) +
  geom_sf(aes('tree_frequency'))

plot(zip_trees)

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = zip_trees, aes(fill = tree_frequency)) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(name = "Tree Frequency")
  



```
